title: The Extent of Delay in Diagnosis, Treatment and their Associated Factors among Tuberculosis Patients Attending Government Hospitals of Rishikesh, Uttarakhand: A Cross-Sectional Study.
notes: Government hospitals in Rishikesh; medians patient 16d, system 43d, treatment 4d, total 81d

title: Time Elapsed from onset of symptoms to antituberculosis treatment in children with central nervous system tuberculosis in a tertiary hospital in South India: A mixed-methods pilot study.
notes: South India pediatric CNS-TB; mean symptom-to-treatment 44d (SD 64.1).

title: Reasons and extent of delay in the diagnosis of pulmonary tuberculosis after the appearance of symptoms.
notes: Delay refers to mean days from symptom onset to diagnosis in Aligarh tertiary setting.

title: Factors associated with the delay in diagnosis of extrapulmonary tuberculosis at the patient and health system level: A study from a rural setting in India.
notes: Rural extrapulmonary TB cohort; medians patient 14d (IQR 7-30), system 21d (IQR 8-48), total 35d (IQR 15-78).

title: Delay in the Diagnosis and Treatment of Tuberculosis among Tuberculosis Patients in South-East Delhi, India.
notes: South-East Delhi public facilities (2019-2020); mean patient 25.3d (SD 8.2), system 24.2d (SD 3.9), total 49.5d.
